panel.label: Starlight Skin
panel.name: starlight_skin_panel
panel.text_editor:
Starlight 2.2.3 (release compatible with 2.2.0.212097)
Starlight is an alternative skin for Viewer 2. It is provided by residents for residents, with the intention of providing an alternative, brighter, and hopefully easier to use interface.
THIS VERSION IS DESIGNED FOR VIEWER 2.2 - consult https://wiki.secondlife.com/wiki/Viewer_Skins/Starlight for the latest versions.
The vast majority of the code is provided by Linden Labs. The amended design and creation is the responsibility of Hitomi Tiponi, and it also utilises the work of various Second Life residents especially the following: Alexandrea Fride, psi Merlin, Hugh Helendale, Digital Scribe, Naomah Beaumont, Nadin, KirstenLee Cinquetti.
In addition the following residents have assisted with testing and in other ways: BearTrap Rodas, Avi Arrow, Kishta Aluveaux, Linda Haber, Adeon Writer, Naomah Beaumont, Darien Caldwell, Moon Metty, Beebo Brinks, Sami Galewind.
